crypto_elements.implementation: MD-style hash function with compression rounds

crypto_elements.description: SHA-1 style hash function with known vulnerabilities

crypto_elements.implementation: Message block compression with round constants
crypto_elements.description: Hash compression functions with merkle-damgard construction

primary_weakness: Contains SHA-1 style hash which is cryptographically broken and MD5-style hash with collision vulnerabilities
additional_notes: Both hash algorithms implemented have known cryptanalytic attacks and should not be used for security purposes
